file_content.text: Nice work. I'd never have made it out of that stink hole alive.
Lobacc says the recordings in here should be enough to make arrests.
Perfect. Perfect. I already talked to the Senate about getting you paid.
If this really helps put the Black Sun out of commission, it's blasted priceless.
If the violence gets any worse, the Senate's talking about giving up the lower levels altogether.
I don't know how long Lobacc's going to wait there. Alive, anyway.
Did Lobacc send you?
Guess not. Detective Dooce Everton. Senate security hired me to get hard evidence on who's pulling the strings in the Black Sun. Someone they can put behind bars.
I was hoping one of my informants sent you.
What evidence are you looking for? I might know something.
Can I help?
They'll take anything I can give them--names, known hideouts, family members....
Is this a paid position? I've done worse.
I could be an informant....
I've got a budget. You want to help out, I'm sure I can get the Senate to cover the extra.
Sorry to disappoint you.
Not me.
I don't suppose you're looking for work? Honorable stuff; service of the Republic?
I've been working a snitch for a while, finally got him ready to give holo-evidence against the heavy hitters in the Black Sun.
But he'll only meet on his turf. It's a cantina, worst of the worst, blaster fights every night. I'm known down there and I wouldn't make it back.
These gangs are a blight on Coruscant's good name.
I will risk it.
I agree, Master Jedi. Perhaps if more of your order were here, it wouldn't have come to this.
I'd like to see one of these thugs take on Havoc Squad.
I can do it.
That would be a sight. Almost makes me want to come along. Almost.
I think I know that spot--I've got a tab there.
My kind of place.
You looked like the lower levels might be your stomping grounds.
What do you need?
It's simple, really.
Lobacc should be waiting at these coordinates. I'll call ahead; tell him to expect an... unusual... group.
Lobacc should be waiting at these coordinates. I'll transmit your image, let him know you're coming.
Then you just need to make it out with the recordings before the Black Sun tries to take it off your fresh bleeding corpse.
Don't ask me to risk my life because you're afraid to risk yours.
Not my scene. [Refuse quest]
When you put it that way, it does sound kind of rude....
Have yourself a day, friend.
